text: Yisakalē āllāha samparkē michā raṭanā karaē, siham̐tatakai ḍāṅara yālima ārau kōna ha’ba pāraē? Siham̐taka siham̐tara pratipālakara sanmukhata upasthita karaōraā ha’ba ārau sākṣīsakalē ka’ba, ‘iham̐tē nija pratipālakara biṣaẏē michā kaichila’. Sāradhāna! Yālimasakalara ōparata āllāhara abhiśāpa
